cats.name: Ellie
cats.backstory: Against all odds…Ellie and her siblings were found at four weeks old and brought to a local shelter. The others all died of panleukopenia. Ellie had it too and the 1.5 lb. kitty requiring urgent, aggressive treatment was transferred to Gerdy’s. After weeks in intensive care, Ellie is now healthy and ready for adoption. Affectionate and full of beans, Ellie is high energy and must have a young, active family with children over 12 years old. Ellie must be the only pet in the home.

cats.name: Jabba
cats.backstory: Jabba The Hutt is a beautiful 10-year-old female. She is cuddly and affectionate.

cats.name: Becky
cats.backstory: Becky is a beautiful 8 years old cat from Mère Théréchat's shelter. She was transferred to the Animal Rescue Network last November in order to be adopted. She is sweet and calm. She likes to be pet and gentle people. She does not always get along well with other cats so she would prefer a forever home where she can be the only cat.

cats.name: Maggie
cats.backstory: Maggie arrived at the shelter soon after the pandemic. Maggie is a little cat with chronic constipation problems. She requires frequent visits to the veterinarian as well as specialized food and medication to help pass the stool. She is an affectionate and calm cat.

cats.name: Katia
cats.backstory: The beautiful Katia was a stray before getting to the shelter in May 2018. She's been with us for already more than 2 years! Indeed, Katia, even if she is gorgeous, was not social at all! The socialization team from the shelter worked hard with Katia who is now ready to be adopted. However, she remains a cat with character. She is crazy for treats so that is how we become her friends! Katia doesn't like other cats, so she is looking for a home just for herself. The person who will adopt Katia will need to be patient and be willing to work with the adoption team and our cat behaviour specialist.

cats.name: Clement
cats.backstory: Je suis explorateur et timide. J'aurai besoin de beaucoup de temps et de calme pour m'adapter. Je peux vivre avec des adolescents, je ne peux pas cohabiter avec des chiens, je peux cohabiter avec d'autres chats. J'ai besoin d'une nourriture équilibrée mais sans attention particulière. Chaton très nerveux, aura besoin d'un compagnon félin a la maison.

cats.name: Alban et Albert
cats.backstory: Ils devront être adoptés ensemble. Ils sont très nerveux et auront besoin de beaucoup de patience et d'un environnement sans trop de va et vient pour qu'ils puissent s'épanouir.
